guides.title: Application Caching
guides.description: Use application caching to improve server response time

guides.title: Circuit Breaker
guides.description: Report the failure of a service, then limit access to the failed service until it becomes available to handle requests

guides.title: Externalized Configuration
guides.description: Use a ConfigMap to externalize configuration and keep passwords/api keys safe. (Requires OpenShift)

guides.title: Health Check
guides.description: Monitor an application's uptime, and ability to service requests

guides.title: Istio - Circuit Breaker
guides.description: Limiting access to a degraded service until it becomes available to handle requests. This helps prevent cascading failures in other services that depend on the failed services for functionality.

guides.title: Istio - Distributed Tracing
guides.description: Integrated distributed tracing allows following requests through an application running on an Istio-enabled cluster.

guides.title: Istio - Security
guides.description: Secure communication between microservices with Mutual TLS, and allow or deny access to others services using ACL.

guides.title: Istio - Routing
guides.description: Route traffic to/from services, including load balancing traffic to different versions of the same service. Set up A/B tests, canary deployments, or deployments during a release.

guides.title: Deploy as a WAR
guides.description: Learn how to deplay a Spring Boot Application (with JSP page and using JSTL) as a WAR file.
